title: Sampler, 1774
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: cross-stitch embroidery on plain weave
dimensions: Frame H x W: 38.1 x 34.9 cm (15 x 13 3/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description: Register of the members of the Dundas family worked in black cross-stitch in the upper third; a large house with gardens below, flanked by flowering trees; stylized running vine border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1774.
1774. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
